comments: I have had Brechlin as a teacher in High School as well as in college. He is by far the BEST math professor I have ever had. I have had him for a math professor in various math subjects over the last 10 years and he made me turn into a math wiz (And i hate math). Because of him I have done so well in other math courses. THANK YOU!!!!
If you are struggling with Math take his class when he`s done with you you`ll be a math wiz. Best teacher for beginer algebra. Funny too, looks like the weather guy on channel 8

Great teacher. Will not move on from a lesson if every student in the class doesn\'t understand. He\'s always willing to help. Doing homework is mandatory and there\'s a lot of it. But it\'s very much worth it. He is also a wiseass with a good sense of humor so class is pretty fun too. Definitely a great math teacher!

he teaches at my old high school as well as gateway and I had him every year since i was a freshman and i couldnt stand him because he was hard on me but as the years passed i grew up and learned to realize that he was only trying to push me cause he knew i could do better...excellent man def take his class very encouraging

Very good teaher and very helpful, he has a way to make you understand the hardest parts of the chapter. willing to stay late and help. very funny, very fair with grades, always has a good advice to give. he is really the best math teachers at Gateway.

GREAT TRACHER!!! Never passed a math class before in my life till I took his class. He is a great teacher and gives extra help whenever you need it. He is very fair and doesnt let you give up and thanks to him i understand algebra and passed His class and then Math 137 with an A!!
Hands down the best math teacher EVER! Extremly helpfull, nice & educated. Willing to stay late & come early to help. GREAT MOTIVATOR...you will LOVE him!!
